00047         enum ThresholdType {
00048             Binary = CV_THRESH_BINARY,
00049             BinaryInv = CV_THRESH_BINARY_INV,
00050             MaskThres = CV_THRESH_MASK,
00051             Otsu = CV_THRESH_OTSU,
00052             ToZero = CV_THRESH_TOZERO,
00053             ToZeroInv = CV_THRESH_TOZERO_INV,
00054             Trunc = CV_THRESH_TRUNC
00055         };

00059             Blackhat = CV_MOP_BLACKHAT,
00060             Open = CV_MOP_OPEN,
00061             Gradient = CV_MOP_GRADIENT,
00062             Close = CV_MOP_CLOSE,
00063             Tophat = CV_MOP_TOPHAT

00082         class ProcessableImage : public Image {
00083         public:
00084 // Constructors
00085             ProcessableImage();
00086             ProcessableImage(const ProcessableImage&);
00087             ProcessableImage(const Image&);
00094             ProcessableImage(CvSize, int = UByte, int = 3);
00095             virtual ~ProcessableImage();
00096             
00097 // Public Methods
00104             void threshold(double, double = 255, int = Binary);
00112             void adaptiveThreshold(double = 255, int = Mean, int = Binary, int = 3);
00113             
00120             Image* warpPerspective(CvPoint2D32f*, CvPoint2D32f* = NULL);
00125             Image* warpPerspective(CvMat*);
00126             
00128             CvPoint2D32f* findChessboardCorners(int, int, int = CV_CALIB_CB_ADAPTIVE_THRESH);
00129             
00131             inline void sobel(int xOrder, int yOrder, int apertureSize) { cvSobel(m_image, m_image, xOrder, yOrder, apertureSize); }
00133             inline void canny(double threshold1, double threshold2, double apertureSize, Image* dest = NULL) { cvCanny(m_image, dest ? dest->cvImage() : m_image, threshold1, threshold2, apertureSize); }
00134             
00140             void morphologyEx(int, int = 1);
00142             inline void morphologyOpen() { morphologyEx(Open); }
00144             inline void morphologyClose() { morphologyEx(Close); }
00145             
00147             inline void meanShiftFiltering(int maxLevel, int spatialRadius, int colorRadius, Image* dest = NULL) { cvPyrMeanShiftFiltering(m_image, dest ? dest->cvImage() : m_image, spatialRadius, colorRadius, maxLevel); }
00154             inline void inpaint(Mask* mask, double radius, int method = NavierStokes) { cvInpaint(m_image, mask, m_image, radius, method); }
00155
